Copy, Gold Leader. I'm already on my way out.
Red Three, Red Two, pull in!
Cut to the left, I'll take the leader.

Forgive me. I feel it again... The pull to the light... Supreme Leader senses it. Show me again... The power of the darkness... And I'll let nothing stand in our way... Show me... Grandfather... and I will finish... what you started.
That lightsaber... It belongs to me.
We're not done yet.

You're so lonely... So afraid to leave... At night, desperate to sleep... You imagine an ocean... I see it... I see the island... And Han Solo... You feel like he's the father you never had. He would have disappointed you.

You're so right.

By the grace of your training I will not be seduced.
I'll destroy her. And you. And all of it.

The Empire, your parents, the Resistance, the Sith, the Jedi... let the past die. Kill it, if you have to. That's the only way to become what you are meant to be.
You're not alone.
Noooo!
Do you know the truth about your parents? Or have you always known? You've just hidden it away. Say it.
They were filthy junk traders. Sold you off for drinking money. They're dead in a pauper's grave in the Jakku desert. You come from nothing. You're nothing. But not to me.
You're nothing. But not to me
You do? Ah, you do. You have that look in your eyes. From the forest. You called me a monster.
Yes, I am.
I saw something too. I know that when the time comes, you'll be the one to turn. You'll stand with me, Rey. I saw who your parents are.
It's time to let old things die. Snoke... Skywalker... the Sith... the Jedi... the rebels. Rey... I want you to join me. We can rule together and bring a new order to the galaxy.
No, no. You're still holding on! Let go! You want to know the truth about your parents or have you always known? You've just hidden it away. You know the truth. Say it.
Say it.

They were filthy junk traders. Sold you off for drinking money. They're dead, in a pauper's grave in a Jakku desert. You had no place in this story. You come from nothing. You're nothing, but not to me. Join me.
Please...
I want every gun that we have to fire on that man
Do it.
More! More!
Prepare my ship!
You're not alone.
I've given everything I have to you... to the Dark Side...
I killed Han Solo. When the moment came, I didn't hesitate!
Lando_Calrissian: We've gotta be able to get some kind of a reading on that shield, up or down.
But how could they be jamming us if they don't know... if we're coming?
Break off the attack! The shield is still up!
Pull up! All craft, pull up!
No, wait! I thought you were blind!
Up a little higher! Just a little higher!
We won't get another chance at this, Admiral.
Han will have that shield down. We've got to give him more time!
Someone must have told them all about my little maneuver at the Battle of Taanab.
I'm surprised they didn't ask you to do it.
Or this'll be the shortest offensive of all time.
Here goes nothing.
Yes, I said *closer*! Move as close as you can, and engage those Star Destroyers at point blank range!
We'll last longer than we will against that Death Star! And we might just take a few of them with us!
We're on our way, Red group, Gold group, all fighters follow me. Ha ha ha, I told you they'd do it!
That blast came from the Death Star! That thing's operational!
That was too close.
All right, Wedge. Go for the power regulator on the north tower.
Watch yourself Wedge, Three from above!
Split up and head back to the surface. And see if you can get a few of those TIE fighters to follow you.
You said they'd be left at the city under my supervision!
Yes, he's alive, and in perfect hibernation.
Princess, we'll find Han. I promise.
How you doin' Chewbacca? Still hanging around with this loser?
I had no choice. They arrived right before you did. I'm sorry.
What?
You're being put into carbon-freeze.
What are you doing here?
What have you done to my ship?
I've just made a deal that'll keep the Empire out of here forever.
Lord Vader, what about Leia and the Wookiee?
Punch it!
They told me they fixed it! I *trusted* them to *fix* it! It's not my fault!
Having trouble with your droid?
Lord Vader, we only use this facility for carbon freezing. If you put him in there it might kill him.
We're getting out of here.
Just trying to help...
HAN!
Would you join us for a little refreshment? Everyone's invited, of course.
Having trouble with your droid?
Shut up and listen. Vader has agreed that turn Leia and Chewie over to me.
They'll have to stay here at least, they'll be safe.
Vader's giving him to the bounty hunter.
He doesn't want you at all. At least, after somebody call... Skywalker.
Lord Vader has set a trap for him.
Yeah? Well, he's on his way.
Stop! I've done all I care. I'm sorry I couldn't do better, but I got my own problems.
Shut up and listen. Now Vader has agreed to turn Leia and Chewie over to me.
They'll have to stay here, but at least they'll be safe.
Vader's giving him to the bounty hunter.
No, he doesn't want you at all! He's after somebody called, uh... Skywalker.
Lord Vader has set a trap for him.
Yeah? Well, he's on his way.
Stop! I've done all I can. I'm sorry I couldn't do better, but I've got my own problems. I've already stuck my neck out farther than I should.
Finn: I don't. I'm just here to get Rey.
Solo, we'll figure it out. We'll use the Force.
Do you know what happened to him?
Hey, Solo, I'm not sure what we're walking into here...
Sorry. Han. Mr. Solo. You should know, I'm a big deal in the Resistance. Which puts a real target on my back. Are there any conspirators here? Like, First Order sympathizers?
Can you fly a TIE Fighter?
Not anymore. The name's Finn and I'm in charge. I'm in charge now, Phasma. I'm in charge.
Because it's the right thing to do.
Hurt him? He almost killed me six times!
You don't know a thing about me. Where I'm from. What I've seen. You don't know the First Order like I do. They'll slaughter us. We all need to run.
I'm not who you think I am.

I'm not Resistance. I'm not a hero. I'm a stormtrooper. Like all of them, I was taken from a family I'll never know. And raised to do one thing. But my first battle, I made a choice. I wasn't gonna kill for them. So I ran. Right into you. And you looked at me like no one ever had. I was ashamed of what I was. But I'm done with the First Order. I'm never going back. Rey, come with me.
I need help with this giant hairy thing!
I'm just trying to get away from the First Order. But you tell us where the base is, I'll get you there first. Deal?
No, no, no. We can't go back to Jakku. We need to get out of this system.
I don't care what color he is! No droid can be that important.
We gotta get as far away from the First Order as we can. We go back to Jakku, we die.
Oh, you gotta be kidding me!
He's carrying a map to Luke Skywalker.
You are the Han Solo that fought with the Rebellion.
You set me up for it.
It had me! But the door...
I disagree. What do we do with her?
That's the only name they ever gave me.
Well, this is what we look like. Some of us. Others look different.
Apparently, he has a map that leads to Luke Skywalker and everyone's after it.
I can disable the shields, but I have to be there. On the planet.
Wait, what? Did you just say Rathtars? Hey! You're not hauling Rathtars on this freighter, are you?
You ever heard of the Trillia Massacre?
We're making our landing approach at lightspeed?
That's one hell of a pilot!
Back to Jak-! Why does everyone want to go back to Jakku?
Okay. For what? Are we really doing this?
Rey, you're a pilot You can fly anywhere. Why go back? You got a family? You got a boyfriend? A cute boyfriend?
What are you doing? Solo, what is she doing?
I can disable the shields, but, I have to be there, on the planet.
Escape? He's one against an army. We have to help him, we have to fight.
I was raised to fight. For the first time I have something to fight for.

You call for order. You beat us down. But when your shiny neck was threatened, you squealed like a whoop hog. The evidence blew up with the base but you and I know the truth. When I put a gun to your head, you shut down Starkiller shields. Now what would your troops do if they found out? Or your masters?
No, I won't let them win.
Poe_Dameron: I can fly anything.
Wha- why? Why are you helping me?
You need a pilot.
I am calm.
Well, because of you, now we have a chance. The General's been after this for a long time.
Well, she certainly is that.
We're going back to Jakku. That's where.
I gotta get my droid before the First Order does.
That's right. He's a BB unit, orange and white. One of a kind.
This one is, pal!
That droid has a map that leads straight to Luke Skywalker.
What's your name?
Well, I'm not going to call you that. Let's see... FN... I'm going to call you Finn. How about that
That's my jacket.
No, no, no, no. Keep it. It suits you. You're a good man, Finn.
Okay, same principle. Use the toggle on the left to switch between missiles, cannons, and mag pulse. Use the sight on the right to aim, triggers to fire.
You might want to rethink your technique.
The Resistance will not be intimidated by you.
We've got company. You have to hide.
...Do I talk first or you talk first? I talk first?
Permission to hop in an X-Wing and blow something up?
She drew them off! All of them!
You must have a thousand questions.
No, no. We are the spark that'll light the fire that'll burn the First Order down.
Happy beeps here, buddy, come on. We've pulled crazier stunts than this.
Thank you for your support, General. Happy beeps.
Attention! This is Commander Poe Dameron of the Republic fleet, I have an urgent communique for General Hugs.
Hi, I'm holding for General Hugs.
Okay. I'll hold.
Hello? Yup, I'm still here.
Hugs?
With an 'H'? Skinny guy. Kinda pasty.
Look, I can't hold forever. If you reach him, tell him Leia has an urgent message for him...
...about his mother.
If they move... stun 'em.
This is Commander Poe Dameron of the Republic fleet. I have an urgent communique for General Hux.
Hi, I'm holding for General Hux.
Hello? Yup, I'm still here.
Hux?
With an 'H'? Skinny guy? Kinda pasty?
Look, I can't hold forever. If you reach him, tell him Leia has an urgent message for him...
...about his mother.
Captain_Phasma: You can't be so stupid as to think this will be easy. My troops will storm this block and kill you all.
You are a bug in the system!
Who would believe a story like that?
So good to have you back.
Rose_Tico: We're going to win this war not by fighting what we hate, but saving what we love!
Finn it's too late don't do this.
I want to put my fist through this beautiful city.
Palpatine: Master Yoda. Do you really think it will come to war?
It is with great reluctance that I have agreed to this calling. I love democracy. I love the Republic. Once this crisis has abated, I will lay down the powers you have given me!
Master Jedi, may I suggest the Senator be placed under the protection of your graces.

The situation is that serious? Oh, but I do, Senator. I realize all too well that additional security might be disruptive for you, but... perhaps someone you're familiar with. An old friend, like... Master Kenobi.
You don't need guidance, Anakin. In time, you will learn to trust your feelings. Then, you will be invincible. I have said it many times, you are the most gifted Jedi I have ever met.
I see you becoming the greatest of all the Jedi, Anakin. Even more powerful than Master Yoda.
I will not let this Republic, which has stood for a thousand years, be split in two. My negotiations will not fail.
And as my first act with this new authority, I will create a grand army of the Republic to counter the increasing threats of the Separatists.
But what senator would have the courage to propose such a radical amendment?
Admiral_Piett: Our ships have sighted the Millennium Falcon, Lord. But it has entered an asteroid field and we can not risk...
Bounty hunters. We don't need that scum.
Lord Vader, our ships have completed their scan of the area and found nothing. If the Millennium Falcon went into light-speed, it'll be on the other side of the galaxy by now.
Yes, my Lord. We'll find them.
The Emperor commands you make contact with him.
The Emperor commands you to make contact with him.
It's an older code, sir, but it checks out. I was about to clear them.
Intensify the forward batteries, I don't want anything to get through.
I have my orders from the Emperor himself. He has something special planned for them. We only need to keep them from escaping.
Luke_Skywalker: Alderaan? I'm not going to Alderaan, I've gotta get *home*, it's late, I'm in for it as it is!
Look, I can't get involved. I've got work to do. It's not that I like the Empire; I hate it, but there's nothing I can do about it right now... It's all such a long way from here.
Huh? Oh, the uniform.
She's rich.
Rich, powerful. Listen, if you were to rescue her, the reward would be...
Well, more wealth than you can imagine!
So, what do you think of her, Han?
Good.
You don't believe in the Force, do you?
I have a very bad feeling about this.
But they're gonna kill her!
Sorry.
I'll be careful.
How did my father die?
No, my father didn't fight in the Clone Wars. He was a navigator on a spice freighter.
You fought in the Clone Wars?
I wish I'd known him.
What is it?
Not unless you can alter time, speed up the harvest or teleport me off this rock.
I want to come with you to Alderaan. There's nothing for me here now. I want to learn the ways of the Force and become a Jedi like my father.
You know, I think that R2 unit we bought may have been stolen.
Well, I stumbled across a recording while I was cleaning him. He says that he belongs to someone named Obi-Wan Kenobi. I thought he might have meant old Ben. Do you know what he's talking about?
I wonder if he's related to Ben.
But what if this Obi-Wan comes looking for him?
He knew my father?
I'm Luke Skywalker. I'm here to rescue you.
I'm here to rescue you. I've got your R2 unit. I'm here with Ben Kenobi.
Come on!
I don't understand how we got by those troops. I thought we were dead.
Got him! I got him!
So. You got your reward and you're just leaving, then?
Come on. Why don't you take a look around. You know what's about to happen, what they're up against. They could use a good pilot like you, you're turning your back on them.
3PO?
What? HAHA! Hey, you did it 3PO!

I've seen this raw strength only once before in Ben Solo. It didn't scare me enough then. It does now.
What do you see?

And inside you?
It's nice that way.
Built a thousand generations ago to keep these. The original Jedi texts. Just like me, they're the last of the Jedi religion. You've seen this place. You've seen this island.
This is not going to go the way you think!
Chewie, what are you doing here?
How'd you find me here?
Falcon? Wait. Where's Han?
Leia, I'm sorry.
I came to face him, Leia. And I can't save him.
No one's ever really gone.
That was a cheap move!
Leia.

It's not just about lifting rocks. The force binds everything together.
Close your eyes.
Breathe. Now reach out.

Lesson two. Now that they're extinct, the Jedi are romanticized, deified. But if your strip away the myth and look at their deeds, the legacy of the Jedi is failure. Hypocrisy, hubris.
At the height of their powers, they allowed Darth Sidious to rise, create the Empire, and wipe them out. It was a Jedi Master who was responsible for the training and creation of Darth Vader.

And I became a legend. For many years, there was balance and then I saw... Ben. My nephew with that mighty Skywalker blood. And in my hubris, I thought I could train him, I could pass on my strengths. Han was... Han was about it, but... Leia trusted me with her son. I took him, and a dozen students, and began a training temple. By the time I realized I was no match for the darkness rising in him, it was too late.

I went to confront him, and he turned on me. He must've thought I was dead. When I came to, the temple was burning. He had vanished with a handful of my students, and slaughtered the rest. Leia blamed Snoke, but... it was me. I failed. Because I was Luke Skywalker. Jedi Master. A legend.
You need a teacher. I cannot teach you.
I will never train another generation of Jedi. I came to this island to die. It's time for the Jedi to end.
At the height of their powers, they allowed Darth Sidious to rise create the Empire, and wipe them out.
Leave this island, now!
STOP!
Leave this island, now!

I saw darkness. I sensed it building in him. I'd seen it in moments during his training. But then I looked inside, and it was beyond what I ever imagined. Snoke had already turned his heart. He would bring destruction and pain and death, and the end of everything I love because of what he will become, and for the briefest moment of pure instinct, I thought I could stop it. It passed like a fleeting shadow, and I was left with shame and with consequence. And the last thing I saw were the eyes of a frightened boy whose Master had failed him.
This is not going to go the way you think!
Rey... Don't do this.

You don't need Luke Skywalker. You think what? I'm gonna walk out with a laser sword and face down the whole First Order? What did you think was going to happen here? You think that I came to the most unfindable place in the galaxy for no reason at all? Go away.
Looks like I'm going nowhere... I'm gonna finish cleaning those 'droids.
It's not impossible. I used to bullseye womp rats in my T-16 back home, they're not much bigger than two meters.

Red Five standing by.

All right, I'll give it a try.
I don't, I don't believe it.
I won't fail you. I'm not afraid.

Right...

Well, mostly because of my father, I guess.
There's something not right here... I feel cold. Death.
What's in there?
I want my lamp back. I'm gonna need it to get out of this slimy mudhole.
I don't know. I feel like...
Like we're being watched.
We'll never get it out now!
Echo Three to Echo Seven. Han, old buddy, do you read me?
Well, I finished my circle. I don't pick up any life readings.
Right. I'll see you shortly. There's a meteorite that hit the ground near here. I want to check it out. It won't take long.
Chewie, I'll be waiting for your signal. Take care, you two. May the force be with you.
But Han and Leia will die if I don't.
But I can help them! I feel the Force!
And sacrifice Han and Leia?
I understand. R2? Fire up the converters.
I will. And I'll return, I promise.
Thanks to you.
Ben... Ben. Why didn't you tell me?
You'll find I'm full of surprises.
You were lucky to get out of there.
I saw - I saw a city in the clouds.
They were in pain...
The future?
Will they die?
I've got to go to them.
How far away is Yoda? Will it take us long to get there?
Now all I got to is find this Yoda. If he even exists. It's a really strange place to find a Jedi Master. This place gives me the creeps.
Still... there's something familiar about this place.
I don't know, I feel like...
... like we're being watched!
I'm looking for someone.
I don't think so.
I'm looking for a great warrior.
Put that down, now we...

But, Han and Leia will die if I don't.
But, I can help them. I feel the Force.
But I've learnt so much since then. Master Yoda, I promise to return and finish what I've begun. You have my word.
That's why I have to go.
You won't.
And sacrifice Han and Leia?
I understand.
R2, fire up the converters.
I will! And I'll return. I promise!
I'm looking for someone.
I don't want your help. I want my lamp back. I need it to get out of this slimy mudhole.
I'll never join you!
He told me enough! He told me *you* killed him!
No. No. That's not true. That's impossible!
But you'll die.
No. You're coming with me. I'll not leave you here, I've got to save you.
Father... I won't leave you.
Your thoughts betray you, Father. I feel the good in you, the conflict.
You couldn't bring yourself to kill me before and I don't believe you'll destroy me now.
Wouldn't miss it.
Same as always.
Never. I'll never turn to the Dark Side. You've failed, your highness. I am a Jedi, like my father before me.
Master Yoda, you can't die.

Search your feelings, Father, you can't do this. I feel the conflict within you. Let go of your hate.

Vader's on that ship.
I know... father.
I have accepted that you were once a Jedi named Anakin Skywalker, my father.
Why not?... It's who you are.
I will not fight you, father.
Vader's here, now, on this moon.

I feel his presence. But he can also feel mine. He's come for me. He can feel it when I'm near. That's why I have to go. As long as I stay, I'm endangering the group and our mission. I have to face him.
If I don't make it back, you're the only hope for the Alliance.
You're wrong, Leia. You have that power too. In time you'll learn to use it as I have. The Force runs strong in my family. My father has it. I have it. And... my sister has it. Yes. It's you, Leia.
I must be allowed to speak.
You will bring Captain Solo and the Wookiee to me.
Nevertheless, I'm taking Captain Solo and his friends with me. You can either profit by this or be destroyed. It's your choice, but I warn you not to underestimate my powers.
Master Yoda... is Darth Vader my father?
Yoda, I must know. If you know, tell me.
Yes.
Unfortunate that I know the truth?
No.
Leia, do you remember your mother? Your real mother?
What do you remember?
Tell me.
I have no memory of my mother. I never knew her.
There's nothing to see. I used to live here, you know.
Because, there is good in him. I've felt it. He won't turn me over to the Emperor. I can save him. I can turn him back to the good side. I have to try.
*Quietly*. There may be more of them out there.
Come with me. Leave everything behind.
I'll meet you back at the fleet.
I will.
Threepio, tell them if they don't do as you wish, you'll become angry and use your magic.
Just tell them.
I'm endangering the mission. I shouldn't have come.
Then I am a Jedi.
You will take me to Jabba now.
You serve your master well. And you will be rewarded.
You're gravely mistaken. You won't convert me as you did my father.
Master Yoda, you can't die.
I'll see you back at the fleet.
Think nothing of it.
Meet you back at the fleet.
I will.
Never I'll never turn to the dark side
You failed your highness, I am a Jedi like my father before me.
Princess_Leia: Help me, Obi-Wan Kenobi; you're my only hope.
Someone has to save our skins. Into the garbage chute, fly boy.
That doesn't sound too hard.
We, uh, ran into some old friends.
I love you.
Would you please stop calling me that?

Occasionally, maybe... when you aren't acting like a scoundrel.
Stop that.
Afraid?
I'm not trembling.
I happen to like nice men.
No, you're not. You're...
Let go.
Let go, please.
Captain, being held by you isn't quite enough to get me excited.
I had nothing to do with it. General Rieekan thinks it's dangerous for anyone to leave the system until they've activated the energy shield.
I don't know where you get your delusions, laser brain.
You're not actually going IN to an asteroid field?
I take it back.
I'd just as soon kiss a Wookiee.
The cave is collapsing.
Luke! Luke! Don't! It's a trap! It's a trap!
Han, we need you.
Yes.
I need? I don't know what you are talking about.
And what precisely am I supposed to know?
Yes, you're great help to us you're a natural leader.
You're imagining things.
I'd just as soon kiss a wookiee.
I hope you know what you're doing.
I know where Luke is!
We're going to get pulverized if we stay out here much longer.
I love you.
I am not a committee!

All troop carriers will assemble at the north entrance. The heavy transport ships will leave as soon as they're loaded. Only two fighter escorts per ship. The energy shield can only be opened for a short time, so you'll have to stay very close to your transports.

The ion cannon will fire several shots to make sure any enemy ships will be out of your flight path. When you've gotten past the energy shield, proceed directly to the rendezvous point. Understood? Good luck.
Some day you're gonna be wrong, I just hope I'm there to see it.
You have your moments. Not many of them, but you do have them.
I have a bad feeling about this...
This bucket of bolts's never gonna get us past that blockade.
I'll be back.
Yes, very friendly...
It's risky but we can't hold out much longer. We have no choice.
Evacuate remaining ground staff.
Not really.
Would it help if I got out and pushed?
I love you.
What about Han?
Vader wants us all dead.
And we're the bait.
You certainly have a way with people.
Someone who loves you.
He wasn't. I can feel it.
Yes.
Oh, Han, it's not like that at all.
He's my brother.
Luke, tell me. What's troubling you?
How do you know?
Why?
Luke, don't talk that way. You have a power I don't understand and could never have.
I know. Somehow, I've always known.
Luke, what's wrong?
Just a little bit. She died when I was very young.
Just... images really. Feelings.
She was... very beautiful. Kind, but sad. Why are you asking me this?
I... I can't tell you.
But, why must you confront him?
Hurry. The Alliance should be assembled by now.
It only takes one to sound the alarm.
General, count me in.
But these are my friends. 3PO, tell them they must be set free.
How is it?
That's all any of us can see.
Hurry. The Alliance should be assembled by now.
C-3PO: I beg your pardon, but what do you mean, "naked?"
My parts are showing? Oh, my goodness, oh!
Hello, I am C-3PO, human cyborg relations. How might I serve you?
I can assure you they will never get me onto one of those dreadful starships.
DIE, Jedi dogs. Oh... what did I say?
Oh my goodness! Shut me down. Machines building machines. How perverse.
This is such a drag.
I'm quite beside myself.
I'm programmed for etiquette, not destruction!
What's all this? A battle? There must be some mistake! I'm programmed for etiquette, not destruction!
I've had the most peculiar dream.
Master Owen, may I present two most important visitors?
He says he has a message from an Obi-Wan Kenobi, Master Anakin. Do you know what he's talking about?

What?
Oh, no.
Oh, dear.
My lady, is there anything I might do?
Just you reconsider playing that message for him!
No, I don't think he likes you at all.
No, I don't like you either.
We seem to be made to suffer. It's our lot in life.
He made a fair move. Screaming about it can't help you.

I see your point, sir. I suggest a new strategy, R2

I would much rather have gone with Master Luke than stay here with you. I don't know what all this trouble is about, but I'm sure it must be your fault.
You watch your language!
Is there anything I can do?
Don't call me a mindless philosopher, you overweight glob of grease.
Where could they be?
Use the comlink? Oh my! I forgot, I turned it off.
Are you there sir?
We've had some problems...
Listen to them, they're dying R2! Curse my metal body, I wasn't fast enough, it's all my fault! My poor Master.
You must repair him! Sir, if any of my circuits or gears will help, I'll gladly donate them.
Help! I think I'm melting! This is all your fault!
That malfunctioning little twirp, this is all his fault.
Did you hear that? They shut down the main reactor. We'll be destroyed for sure. This is madness.
There'll be no escape for the princess this time.
R2D2 where are you?
Now don't you forget this! Why I should stick my neck out for you is far beyond my capacity!
The tractor beam is coupled to the main reactor in seven locations. A power loss at one of the terminals will allow the ship to leave.
It wasn't my fault, sir, please don't deactivate me. I told him not to go, but he's faulty, malfunctioning. Kept babbling on about his mission.
I've just about had enough of you. Go that way. You'll be malfunctioning within a day, you near-sighted scrap pile. And don't let me catch you following me begging for help because you won't get it.
And I am C-3PO, human-cyborg relations. And this is my counterpart R2D2.
Over here! Hey! Hey! Help! Please, Help!
Master Luke, sir. Pardon me for asking, but what should R2 and I do if we're discovered here?
That isn't very reassuring.
We've stopped. Wake up! Wake up!
We're doomed.
Sir, the possibility of successfully navigating an asteroid field is approximately 3,720 to 1.
Oh you're perfectly welcome, sir.
If I may say so, sir, I noticed earlier the hyperdrive motivator has been damaged. It's impossible to go to lightspeed!
Don't worry about Master Luke. I'm sure he'll be all right. He's quite clever, you know... for a human being.
Oh. They've encased him in Carbonite. He should be quite well protected. If he survived the freezing process, that is.
Excuse me sir, but might I inquire as to what's going on?
Impossible man.
Pulverized?
Sir, it's quite possible this asteroid is not entirely stable.
Don't say things like that! Of course we'll see Master Luke again! And he'll be quite all right, you'll see!
Stupid little short-circuit! He'll be *quite* all right.
Oh, yes, that's very good, I like that... Oh!
Well, now, something's not right, because now I can't see!
Oh, oh, that's much better. Wait... wait. Oh, my! What have you done? I'm BACKWARDS. You flea-bitten furball! Only an overgrown mop-head like you would be stupid enough to...
I thought that hairy beast would be the end of me.
Of course I've looked better.
Sir, If I may venture an opinion...
The odds of successfully surviving an attack on an Imperial Star Destroyer are approximately...
Noisy brute. Why don't we just go to lightspeed?

The City's central computer told you? R2-D2, you know better than to trust a strange computer.
Ouch! Pay attention to what you're doing!
I didn't ask you to turn on the thermal heater. I merely commented that it was freezing in the princess's chamber...
But it's SUPPOSED to be freezing! How we are ever going to dry out her clothes, I really don't know!
That sounds like an R2 unit in there! I wonder if... Hello? How interesting.
Oh, my! I... I'm terribly sorry. I didn't mean to intrude. No, please don't get up.
Don't blame me. I'm an interpreter. I'm not supposed to know a power socket from a computer terminal.
Master Luke, Sir, it's so good to see you fully functional again. R2 expresses his relief also.
No! We're not interested in the hyperdrive on the Millenium Falcon, it's fixed!
Just open the door, you stupid lug!
I never doubted him for a second! Wonderful!
I'm terribly sorry about all this. After all, he's only a Wookiee.
Artoo says that the chances of survival are 725 to 1. Actually Artoo has been known to make mistakes... from time to time... Oh dear...
Sir, I don't know where your ship learned to communicate, but it has the most peculiar dialect.
I knew all along. Had to be a mistake.
What are you doing? Trust him, trust him!
It sounds like Han!
I'm terribly sorry about all this. After all, he's only a Wookiee!
Oh, yes! Stop, please! I am not ready to die!
His high exaltedness, the Great Jabba the Hutt, has decreed that you are to be terminated immediately.
You will therefore be taken to the Dune Sea, and cast into the pit of Carkoon, the nesting place of the all-powerful Sarlaac.
In his belly you will find a new definition of pain and suffering as you are slowly digested over a thousand years.
I am C-3PO, human/cyborg...
Umm... yes.
I am fluent in over six million forms of communication, and can readily...
Disintegrated?
I do believe they think I am some sort of god.
I beg your pardon General Solo, but that just wouldn't be proper.
It's against my programming to impersonate a deity.
I'm rather embarrassed, General Solo, but it appears that you are to be the main course at a banquet in my honor.
At last, Master Luke's come to rescue me!
It sounds dangerous.
He says the scouts are going to show us the quickest way to the shield generator.
R2, why did you have to be so brave?
Wonderful. We are now a part of the tribe.
But, Master Luke, what magic? I couldn't possibly...
I am C-3PO, Human...
Oh. Well, yes.
Your Royal Highness.
Exciting is hardly the word I would choose.
What could possibly have come over Master Luke? Is it something I did? He never expressed any unhappiness with my work.
I never knew I had it in me.
I have decided that we shall stay here.
What a forsaken place this is! Why couldn't that bounty hunter have taken Captain Solo to a more... pleasant environment?
We're leaving? But, what about Master Luke?
I thought he was going to rescue Captain Solo?
You mean, we're going to that horrible fortress alone?
We're doomed.
Don't be so sure. If I told you half the things I've heard about this Jabba the Hutt, you'd probably short-circuit.
Toronto? Gosh.
Yes. I must get my proper arm reinstalled.
Princesses.

General, I regret to inform you, but, this map recovered from BB-8 is only partially complete. And even worse, it matches no chartered system on record. We simply do not have enough information to locate Master Luke.
The map - it is complete!
Oh. Well, I will certainly try, General. Nervous?
Master Luke.
Bail_Organa: You really think that is a wise decision during these stressful times?

Rey: This is the ship that made the Kessel Run in fourteen parsecs?
You will remove these restraints and leave this cell with the door open.
Are you offering me a job?
I didn't know there was this much green in the whole galaxy.
I stole it. From Unkar Plutt. He stole it from the Irving Boys, who stole it from Ducain.
This is the Millennium Falcon? You're Han Solo?
I can't explain it. And you wouldn't believe it.
Classified, really? Me too. Big secret.
We'll see each other again. I believe that.
Finn, what are you talking about?
I think I can handle myself.
That happens when you're being hunted by a creature in a mask.

I'm never touching that thing again. I don't want any part of this.
Unkar Plutt did. I thought it was a mistake, too. Puts too much...
This droid has to get to the Resistance base as soon as possible.
From inside the hangar? Is that even possible?
I've flown some ships, but I've never left the planet.
Your last shot was dead on.
You got him with one blast!
I've never met a Resistance fighter before.
BB-8 says he's on a secret mission. He has to get back to your base.
Unkar Plutt installed a fuel pump, too. If we don't prime that, we're not going anywhere.
I've got to get back to Jakku.
None of your business, that's why!
It's a power that Jedi have that lets them control people and... make things float.
That place was trying to show me something.
But I didn't see you. Nothing from you. You've closed yourself off from the Force. Of course you have.
The island. Life. Death and decay, that feeds new life. Warmth. Cold. Peace. Violence.
I know everything I need to know about you!
You didn't fail Kylo. Kylo failed you. I won't.
I need someone to show me my place in all of this.
He said you're coming back with us.
Long story, we'll tell you on the Falcon.

You don't have to do this. I feel the conflict in you. It's tearing you apart. Ben, when we touched hands, I saw your future. Just the shape of it but solid and clear. You will not bow before Snoke. You'll turn. I'll help you.
Don't do this Ben. Please don't go this way.
Master Skywalker? I'm with the Resistance. Your sister Leia sent me. We need your help.
You underestimate Skywalker and Ben Solo and me. It will be your downfall.

And a Jedi who saved him. Yes. Your father was the most hated man in the galaxy. He caused so much death and destruction for many years. But you saw there was conflict inside him. You believed that he wasn't gone. That he could be turned.
The galaxy may need a legend. I need someone to show me my place in all this. And you didn't fail Kylo. Kylo failed you. I won't.
Something inside me has always been there. But now it's awake. And I'm afraid. I don't know what it is or what to do with it. And I need help.
Why not? I've seen your daily routine. You're not busy.
Is it true? Did you try to murder him?
Did you do it? Did you kill Kylo Ren?
I felt something... it awakened, but now I need to know how to wield it.
Did you do it? Did you create Kylo Ren?
You failed him by thinking his choice was made. It wasn't! There's still conflict in him. If he would turn from the Dark Side, that could shift the tide! This could be how we win!
It is. Just now, when we touched hands, I saw his future. As solid as I'm seeing you. If I go to him, Ben Solo will turn.
Then he is our last hope.
You underestimate Skywalker, and Ben Solo, and me. It will be your downfall.

Supreme Leader Snoke was explicit. Capture the droid if we can, but destroy it if we must.

Today is the end of the Republic. The end of a regime that acquiesces to disorder. At this very moment in a system far from here, the New Republic lies to the galaxy while secretly supporting the treachery of the rogues of the Resistance. This fierce machine which you have built, upon which we stand will bring an end to the Senate, to their cherished fleet. All remaining systems will bow to the First Order and will remember this as the last day of the Republic!
This is General Hux of the First Order. The Republic is no more. Your fleet are Rebel scum and war criminals. Tell your precious princess there will be no terms, there will be no surrender...
This is Hux. You and your friends are doomed. We will wipe your filth from the galaxy.
